definition: prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: We crossed the state boundary at midnight.
sentences.chinese: 我們在午夜穿過了州界。

sentences.english: Once the thief’s car passed across the state border, our state police had no jurisdiction to follow him.
sentences.chinese: 一旦竊賊的車越過州界，本州的警察便無權跟蹤他。

sentences.english: I will not forget the morning at triple point.
Allowing consumers to buy insurance across state lines will lower the cost of insurance.
sentences.chinese: 允許消費者跨越州界購買保險能夠降低保險費用。

definition: Tang dynasty province in modern Xinjiang, around Kumul 哈密[Ha1 mi4]/Illinois (US state)
seat of the principal county magistrate in imperial China
Honshū, the main island of Japan
old name for the Pamir high plateau 帕米爾高原|帕米尔高原[Pa4 mi3 er3 Gao1 yuan2] on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
old road/old way/old course (of a river)
